summary: Dr. Howard J. Hoffberg, M.D., pled guilty to Conspiracy to Violate Anti-Kickback statutes, having received $66,600 in kickbacks from Insys Therapeutics for prescribing the opioid Subsys off-label to non-cancer patients. As a result of this crime involving moral turpitude, his medical license (D30980) has been suspended by the Maryland State Board of Physicians.
